# \@ ETH, Zürich

## Sven Panis

Sven is a postdoc in my lab working on understanding the temporal profile of cognitive states. He loves event history analysis.

## Raphaël Fournier

Raph is a PhD student in the lab who is using evidence accumulation modelling to understand cognitive mechanisms that may underpin person perception.
